LanguageData.Hygienic.degreeDatas.0.label: germaphobe
LanguageData.Hygienic.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
LanguageData.Hygienic.degreeDatas.1.label: hygienic
LanguageData.Hygienic.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.
LanguageData.Hygienic.degreeDatas.2.label: unhygienic
LanguageData.Hygienic.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
LanguageData.Hygienic.degreeDatas.3.label: slob
LanguageData.Hygienic.degreeDatas.3.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
